abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews A&E reality television series American Hoggers.
snippet: “American Hoggers,” a reality show, focuses on the family business of the Campbell family of central Texas, which involves capturing and hunting the wild boars.
lead_paragraph: “American Hoggers,” a reality show, focuses on the family business of the Campbell family of central Texas, which involves capturing and hunting the wild boars.

headline.main: Get Away? Not by the Hairs on Their Chinny Chin Chins
headline.print_headline: Get Away? Not by the Hairs On Their Chinny Chin Chins
